ideas.name: Startup societies winning sports competitions for diplomatic recognition
ideas.description: The idea that startup societies could gain diplomatic recognition by winning athletic competitions like Hyrox and eventually Olympic medals.

ideas.name: Prefab/Shipping Housing for Network Society
ideas.description: Exploring prefab and portable housing solutions like Neo Smart Living and Jupe for the network society movement.

ideas.name: Longevity Lecture/Discussion Series at NS
ideas.description: A proposed series of lectures and discussions on aging science, radical longevity, healthspan, techno-futurism ethics, and DeSci/AI builder tracks.

ideas.name: Intramural Sports Leagues
ideas.description: Community sports leagues with commissioners for basketball, beach volleyball, soccer, and pickleball to make exercise a daily habit.

ideas.name: 1:1 Meetups / Speed Networking
ideas.description: Structured 1:1 meetup sessions with random pairing tools for deep networking beyond organic encounters.

ideas.name: Cold plunge leaderboard
ideas.description: A leaderboard to track and rank the longest cold plunge times among community members.

ideas.name: Startup City Business Incubator
ideas.description: An incubator session to brainstorm business ideas that make the startup city more sticky, form teams, find partners, and start business plans.

ideas.name: No smoking rule in breakfast/dinner area
ideas.description: Proposal to ban smoking in the breakfast and dinner areas to improve health and experience for NS members.

ideas.name: Practical 'Man Skills' Class
ideas.description: A first-principles class teaching hands-on hard skills like woodworking, fire building, car maintenance, wiring circuits, and field first aid.

ideas.name: Non-Developer Bounty Collaboration with AI Tools
ideas.description: Non-developers working together to attempt development-based bounties using AI-assisted tools like Cursor, Replit, and Claude, with daily coding quests and weekly dev Q&A.

apps.name: Insurus
apps.description: A home-safety Protect2Earn platform where users earn rewards for completing monthly safety checks with AI photo verification and VeChain blockchain integration.

apps.name: KirakLabs
apps.description: An AI dev shop that helps founders turn ideas into working products fast, with a fractional CTO option for ongoing help.

apps.name: NSPals
apps.description: A community networking and matchmaking tool for NS members with network/state views, vector similarity matching, and feature request boards.

apps.name: NS Bounties / NS Bounty Board
apps.description: A lightweight web app where NS members can post small tasks/jobs as bounties and pay completers in USDC on Base.

apps.name: ROZO
apps.description: A crypto payment platform supporting USDC on multiple chains for real-world transactions at NS merchants with cashback, GDP tracking, and identity verification.

apps.name: Dash Mart
apps.description: A grocery delivery service with under-30-minute delivery, online ordering, and 5% cashback via Rozo payments.

apps.name: Clippy - NS Robotics Club Robot
apps.description: The first robot produced by the NS Robotics Club, a 3D-printed robotic arm platform that can run AI models.

apps.name: NS Collab
apps.description: An open-source hub for NS members to discover who's building what, find co-founders, post projects, with GitHub-like activity graphs and demoday integration.

apps.name: Slouch Sniper
apps.description: A posture-monitoring app that uses webcam to detect slouching and alerts users, available on multiple platforms including Setapp.

apps.name: NS Ride Sharing App
apps.description: A ride-sharing app for NS members to coordinate carpooling between Forest City and Singapore with bus guides and cost splitting.
